text: David Carpenter (12 September 1935 â€“ 4 January 2022) was an English first- class cricketer. He played for Gloucestershire from 1954 to 1963. Carpenter was born in Rodborough, Stroud, Gloucestershire. Carpenter died on 4 January 2022, at the age of 86.Former Glos player David Carpenter sadly dies aged 86. Gloucestershire County Cricket Club website.
